      • expectedTlsMessage

        public boolean expectedTlsMessage(TlsMessage message)
        Description copied from class: TlsState
        Messages will only be forwarded to the current state, if this method returns true for the message. Otherwise an unexpected message alert will be send.
        Specified by:
        expectedTlsMessage in class TlsState
        Parameters:
        message - the message
        Returns:
        true for each expected message, false otherwise
